DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Dapagliflozin Therapy Taiwan
DOC.criteria: 1 . Outpatient equal 20 year age . 2 . T2DM patient initiate dapagliflozin May 1st 2016 second line third line oral antidiabetic therapy , either addon switch one another . Or initiate dapagliflozin adjunctive therapy T2DM subject treat insulin . 3 . Completed followup least 6 month regardless continuation dapagliflozin therapy . 4 . Will provide complete signed write informed consent . 1 . Subjects history SGLT2 inhibitor therapy dapagliflozin prior Baseline . 2 . Subjects Type 1 diabetes . 3 . Treatment investigational drug concurrently retrospective data collection period .
